title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama chat, generate and embed endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, async wrappers.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, chat history and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented-Generation stack using Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app (Rust+React) for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models through slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and model pre-loading.

title: ollama-mistralense
summary: Fine-tuned Mistral model + Ollama Modelfile optimized for concise coding answers.

title: ollama-node
summary: npm package for the official Ollama JS client—same repo as ollama-js.

title: ollama
summary: PyPI package for the official Ollama Python client—same repo as ollama-python.

title: Ollama Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for model announcements, troubleshooting and showcase projects.

title: Show HN: Ollama Hub – Share and download custom Modelfiles
summary: Community site for publishing custom Ollama Modelfiles (analogous to Docker Hub).
